reviewText:
It took me quite some time to acquire this DVD. It seems it was only made in very limited numbers.

Having seen the show in Las Vegas, I was curious how close to the live show the DVD would be.

See, once you get beyond the nudity, you soon realize that the Crazy Horse show  is indeed women with incredible beauty and athleticism, yet, this is combined with a light show that is second to none. True art!!

The women of Crazy Horse are "perfect", but the real genius beyond mere flesh is the light design of this production.

Amazing. Get the DVD if you can find it and afford it. It's 54 minutes long.
